title: Apple Configurator app updated with support for iPhone SE 3 and iPad Air 5
content:
Apple this week updated its Apple Configurator app, which is used to deploy iOS and Mac devices in schools and business. The latest version of the tool makes it fully compatible with the newly released third-generation iPhone SE and fifth-generation iPad Air, as well as the latest versions of iOS and macOS.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple Configurator app updated with support for iPhone SE 3 and iPad Air 5 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple Configurator app was updated with full support for iPhone SE 3 and iPad Air 5, as well as the latest versions of iOS and macOS.
